q1: How many years do you think Mbappe plays for PSG?
a1: He's under contract until 2022, so I think he will stay until then.
q2: I think Mbappe will leave if he gets a good enough offer from a big team like Real Madrid
a2: I think that there are poaching rules that prevent that from happening.

a3: They were big power before game with Real Madrid and lost to them 2 times.So probably not good.
a4: Very effective! It worked out well

a5: He is played many and great games
